New York City is home to one breakfast treat...
...that combines two popular goodies in one tasty menu item.
Called the cronut, it is essentially a croissant and donut.
The owner of the Dominique Ansel Bakery is responsible for the cronut's debut.
Shaped like a standard donut, it is comprised of several layers of croissant dough,...
...which are deep-fried and stuffed with vanilla cream.
The outer shell is warm and crunchy while the inside layers are soft and airy.
...bakery workers roll the cronut in rose sugar and cover it in a glaze.
